title: Desperado - 1996 - Bloodied,But Unbowed
description:
Thought I&#039;d start a thread here about Desperado, a band Bernie was involved in along side Clive Burr (d), Dee Sinder (v), and a fellow named Marc Russel (b). For years their CD was only available as a bootleg called "Bloodied But Unbowed." As I understand it, the CD was done - professionally recorded and all, the artwork was all selected, and BANG! At the last second, the deal was pulled and the CD was never released until only very recently as "Ace." The current version is actually missing some tracks, too. The version I have from 1996 goes:

1. Hang &#039;Em High
2. Gone Bad
3. The Maverick
4. The Heart Is A Lonely Hunter
5. Calling For You
6. See You At Sunrise
7. There&#039;s No Angels Here
8. Made For Trouble
9. Ride Thru The Storm
10. Son Of A Gun
11. Emaheeval
12. Easy Action
13. Heart Of Saturday Night (Tom Waites cover)

Encoded by LAME 3.97 (CBR 320kbit Joint stereo)
